name: Zombo Buster Rising (itch)
description:
Zombo Buster Rising is a fusion of classic 2D side shooter and tower defense. Fight against various zombies, protect your base together with two AI-assisted heroes and get stronger with tons of upgrades. Survive!

FEATURES: 
- Two AI-Assisted NPCs 
- Three super abilities 
- Various upgrades 
- Survival Mode

- Support Windows, Mac and Linux

Ps. This game is also available on Steam. You'll get a Steam key too if you purchase the game here. We hope you love the game!
